inputs.name: Args
inputs.description: A string. Additional parameters to the command.

inputs.name: Avoid mp
inputs.description: An existing file name. Reject pathways passing through locations given by this mask.

inputs.name: C thresh
inputs.description: A float. Curvature threshold - default=0.2.

inputs.name: Colmask4
inputs.description: An existing file name. Mask for columns of matrix4 (default=seed mask).

inputs.name: Correct path distribution
inputs.description: A boolean. Correct path distribution for the length of the pathways.

inputs.name: Dist thresh
inputs.description: A float. Discards samples shorter than this threshold (in mm - default=0).

inputs.name: Distthresh1
inputs.description: A float. Discards samples (in matrix1) shorter than this threshold (in mm - default=0).

inputs.name: Distthresh3
inputs.description: A float. Discards samples (in matrix3) shorter than this threshold (in mm - default=0).

inputs.name: Environ
inputs.description: A dictionary with keys which are a value of type 'str' and with values which are a value of type 'str'. Environment variables.

inputs.name: Fibst
inputs.description: An integer (int or long). Force a starting fibre for tracking - default=1, i.e. first fibre orientation. only works if randfib==0.

inputs.name: Fopd
inputs.description: An existing file name. Other mask for binning tract distribution.

inputs.name: Force dir
inputs.description: A boolean. Use the actual directory name given - i.e. do not add + to make a new directory.

inputs.name: Fsamples
inputs.description: A list of items which are an existing file name. No description provided.

inputs.name: Ignore exception
inputs.description: A boolean. Print an error message instead of throwing an exception in case the interface fails to run.

inputs.name: Inv xfm
inputs.description: A file name. Transformation matrix taking dti space to seed space (compulsory when using a warp_field for seeds_to_dti).

inputs.name: Loop check
inputs.description: A boolean. Perform loop_checks on paths - slower, but allows lower curvature threshold.

inputs.name: Lrtarget3
inputs.description: An existing file name. Column-space mask used for nxn connectivity matrix.

inputs.name: Mask
inputs.description: An existing file name. Bet binary mask file in diffusion space.

inputs.name: Meshspace
inputs.description: 'caret' or 'freesurfer' or 'first' or 'vox'. Mesh reference space - either "caret" (default) or "freesurfer" or "first" or "vox".

inputs.name: Mod euler
inputs.description: A boolean. Use modified euler streamlining.

inputs.name: N samples
inputs.description: An integer (int or long). Number of samples - default=5000.

inputs.name: N steps
inputs.description: An integer (int or long). Number of steps per sample - default=2000.

inputs.name: Network
inputs.description: A boolean. Activate network mode - only keep paths going through at least one seed mask (required if multiple seed masks).

inputs.name: Omatrix1
inputs.description: A boolean. Output matrix1 - seedtoseed connectivity.

inputs.name: Omatrix2
inputs.description: A boolean. Output matrix2 - seedtolowresmask.

inputs.name: Omatrix3
inputs.description: A boolean. Output matrix3 (nxn connectivity matrix).

inputs.name: Omatrix4
inputs.description: A boolean. Output matrix4 - dtimasktoseed (special oxford sparse format).

inputs.name: Onewaycondition
inputs.description: A boolean. Apply waypoint conditions to each half tract separately.

inputs.name: Opd
inputs.description: A boolean. Outputs path distributions.

inputs.name: Os2t
inputs.description: A boolean. Outputs seeds to targets.

inputs.name: Out dir
inputs.description: An existing directory name. Directory to put the final volumes in.

inputs.name: Output type
inputs.description: 'nifti_pair' or 'nifti_pair_gz' or 'nifti_gz' or 'nifti'. Fsl output type.

inputs.name: Phsamples
inputs.description: A list of items which are an existing file name. No description provided.

inputs.name: Rand fib
inputs.description: 0 or 1 or 2 or 3. Options: 0 - default, 1 - to randomly sample initial fibres (with f > fibthresh), 2 - to sample in proportion fibres (with f>fibthresh) to f, 3 - to sample all populations at random (even if f<fibthresh).

inputs.name: Random seed
inputs.description: A boolean. Random seed.

inputs.name: S2tastext
inputs.description: A boolean. Output seed-to-target counts as a text file (useful when seeding from a mesh).

inputs.name: Sample random points
inputs.description: A boolean. Sample random points within seed voxels.

inputs.name: Samples base name
inputs.description: A string. The rootname/base_name for samples files.

inputs.name: Seed
inputs.description: An existing file name or a list of items which are an existing file name or a list of items which are a list of from 3 to 3 items which are an integer (int or long). Seed volume(s), or voxel(s)or freesurfer label file.

inputs.name: Seed ref
inputs.description: An existing file name. Reference vol to define seed space in simple mode - diffusion space assumed if absent.

inputs.name: Simple
inputs.description: A boolean. Rack from a list of voxels (seed must be a ascii list of coordinates).

inputs.name: Step length
inputs.description: A float. Step_length in mm - default=0.5.

inputs.name: Stop mask
inputs.description: An existing file name. Stop tracking at locations given by this mask file.

inputs.name: Target2
inputs.description: An existing file name. Low resolution binary brain mask for storing connectivity distribution in matrix2 mode.

inputs.name: Target3
inputs.description: An existing file name. Mask used for nxn connectivity matrix (or nxn if lrtarget3 is set).

inputs.name: Target4
inputs.description: An existing file name. Brain mask in dti space.

inputs.name: Target masks
inputs.description: A list of items which are a file name. List of target masks - required for seeds_to_targets classification.

inputs.name: Terminal output
inputs.description: 'stream' or 'allatonce' or 'file' or 'none'. Control terminal output: `stream` - displays to terminal immediately (default), `allatonce` - waits till command is finished to display output, `file` - writes output to file, `none` - output is ignored.

inputs.name: Thsamples
inputs.description: A list of items which are an existing file name. No description provided.

inputs.name: Use anisotropy
inputs.description: A boolean. Use anisotropy to constrain tracking.

inputs.name: Verbose
inputs.description: 0 or 1 or 2. Verbose level, [0-2].level 2 is required to output particle files.

inputs.name: Waycond
inputs.description: 'or' or 'and'. Waypoint condition. either "and" (default) or "or".

inputs.name: Wayorder
inputs.description: A boolean. Reject streamlines that do not hit waypoints in given order. only valid if waycond=and.

inputs.name: Waypoints
inputs.description: An existing file name. Waypoint mask or ascii list of waypoint masks - only keep paths going through all the masks.

inputs.name: Xfm
inputs.description: An existing file name. Transformation matrix taking seed space to dti space (either flirt matrix or fnirt warp_field) - default is identity.

name: ProbTrackX2
description: ProbTrackX2, as implemented in Nipype (module: nipype.interfaces.fsl, interface: ProbTrackX2).
